title: Drawing, "Empire State Express- lettering for cowcatcher, for New York Central System", April 1, 1941
inscribed: Printed in black ink, center: Empire State Express / NEW YORK / CENTRAL / SYSTEM; lower right: HENRY DREYFUSS 501 MADISON AVENUE NYC / ISSUES / NEW YORK CENTRAL SYSTEM / SCALE / DATE / DRAWING NO. Inscribed in graphite, lower right: LETTERING FOR COW CATCHER / EMPIRE STATE EXPRESS / 3 MOSES 4/1/41 / NO SCALE 4-1-41 / 259.
description: Design for the letter of cowcatchers for New York trains

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Empire State Express- lettering for cowcatcher, for New York Central System", April 1, 1941.
April 1, 1941. Graphite on tissue. Gift of Henry Dreyfuss. 1972-88-342.
